td.content: s:pt describes recurrent moderate abdominal pain over the past month. she is a female aged 55 yrs. she consumes 2 drinks per night she smokes a pack/day for 2 years o:Height 59 in, Weight 173 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed pantoprazole - 40 mg daily, and ordered CBC with Manual Differential.

td.content: s:pt presents with moderate abdominal pain for 12 days. she is a 57 yr old white F politician. o:Height 59 in, Weight 176 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.
